<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Order the given unit(s) to target the given target (without radio messages).<br>Targeting can be stopped by <code>_unit [[doWatch]] [[objNull]];</code> or<code>_unit [[commandWatch]] [[objNull]];</code>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit '''doTarget''' target

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] or [[Array]] - a single unit or array of units

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> target: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_ESoldier1 [[doTarget]] _WSoldier1;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[assignedTarget]], [[commandTarget]], [[doWatch]] [[doFire]]
</value></part></template>
